page.title: 06THERFIELD SHOP
page.content: MR AND MRS SNOWBALL ARE VERY BUSY PEOPLE THEY HAVE TO GET UP AT 6:30. THEY HAVE A POST OFFICE . THEY HAVE A LOT OF CUSTOMERS ESPECIALLY ON THURSDAY. THEY HAVE THE LEAST CUSTOMERS ON WEDNESDAY.THEY HAVE ALL KINDS OF SWEETS LIKE: BARRELS,JUMPING BEANS,CHOCOLATE,PACERS,MURRAY MINTS,EXTRA STRONG MINTS,BOILED SWEETS AND ECLAIRS.DRINKS:CHERRYADE,LEMONADE, COKE,ORANGEADE,DANELION AND BURDOCK & LIMEADE.CRISPS:READY SALTED,SALT & VINEGAR,CHEESE,ROAST CHICKEN,SMOKEY BACON.THEY SELL TINS,CRISPS,BOTTLES, DRINKS,CARDS,SWEETS,WRAPPING PAPER, CAT & DOG FOOD,PEANUTS & FRUIT. THEY HAVE 2 ASSISTANTS.THEY SERVE PEOPLE FROM OTHER VILLAGES.THEY COME FROM KELSHALL,REED,ROYSTON & WHADDEN.
